description: Bricks are essential to progressing in Expert, as they are required in order to obtain a Furnace.
Now, the question on your mind may be: "Well, without a furnace, how are we supposed to get bricks??"
Courtesy of the /5/Simply Immersive Bricks/5/ mod, bricks can be crafted and then set out to dry. Simply collect some clay and organic compost, and you'll be good to go!
If you're wondering if getting bricks will be like this later on, not to worry. In Expert, infastructure is key. Just make sure to get a Kiln from Clayworks to smelt your bricks at high speeds!
